channel.title: Bookmarks on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Bookmarks on Arrans github.io

item.title: karakeep-app/karakeep
item.description: A self-hostable bookmark-everything app (links, notes and images) with AI-based automatic tagging and full text search

item.title: omnivore-app/omnivore
item.description: Omnivore is a complete, open source read-it-later solution for people who like reading.

item.title: floccusaddon/floccus
item.description: ☁️ Sync your bookmarks privately across browsers and devices

item.title: blob42/gosuki
item.description: A lightweight, open-source, privacy-first bookmark manager that unifies your bookmarks across multiple browsers, syncs them in real time (locally or P2P), requires no extensions, and stores everything locally.

item.title: MatiasDesuu/ThinkDashboard
item.description: A lightweight, self-hosted bookmark dashboard with keyboard shortcuts.

item.title: arran4/gobookmarks
item.description: Landing page for when you open browsers / live bookmarks in go.

item.title: arran4/goa4web-bookmarks
item.description: Landing page for when you open browers / live bookmarks in go. – AI based C -> Go port
